Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Total time between SW-Reviewer Agreed and SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Minimum time it takes for SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation to occur after SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Average duration of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation until the next activity (SW-Awaiting EIC Decision)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total elapsed time from SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants that include both activities
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time from SW-AE Assign Reviewers to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation, specifically in variants where SW-Reviewer Agreed appears at least once
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Minimum time between the last occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed and the start of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation within the same case
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Total resolution time of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in cases that previously experienced reviewer unavailability or decline (e.g., SW-Reviewer Declined, SW-Reviewer Unavailable)
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and the end of case where activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined occurs

Name: Average cycle time of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation compared to the cycle time of SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion
Metric: The average of the duration between activity SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation and the end of the case

Name: Elapsed time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in variants that contain SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Time from the first SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in multi-reviewer assignment scenarios
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Total time spent in SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation relative to the total time spent in SW-Awaiting EIC Decision within the same variant
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation and the end of the case

Name: Average waiting time to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation after the completion of all assigned reviewer agreements (i.e., after the final SW-Reviewer Agreed in a case)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Minimum time from SW-Reviewer No Response to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in cases where no reviewer ultimately agreed
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer No Response' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Time between SW-AE Assign Reviewers Challenge Paper and SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in challenge paper variants that include SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers Challenge Paper' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'
